name: Air Cadets
description:
Air Cadets is a fun 3D arcade flying game where you can climb, dive, twist and turn one of three aircraft around 8 unique maps.

*Now available for iOS and Apple TV*

With three different game modes to choose from you can race against the clock in Time Attack, search and destroy targets in Target Practice or fly freely around at your leisure in Free Flight.

Please note that for optimal performance, we recommend re-booting your device after downloading and closing other applications when playing Air Cadets.


FEATURES:

- 3 aircraft to choose from, each with their own handling characteristics
- 56 levels which take place across 8 unique maps
- 3 game modes: Free Flight, Target Practice and Time Attack
- Support for HD quality / Retina resolutions (iPhone 5 and iPod touch (5th gen) ready)
- Supports all generations of iPhone, iPod touch and iPads (running iOS 4.3+)
- Languages supported English and Spanish
- 64 bit native support
